thread.title: TERRY CREWS: ‘Idiocracy' is so prophetic ‘it actually scares people’
thread.title_full: TERRY CREWS: ‘Idiocracy' is so prophetic ‘it actually scares people’

author: Jacqui Frank and Jason Guerrasio
title: TERRY CREWS: ‘Idiocracy' is so prophetic ‘it actually scares people’
text:
Terry Crews, actor, former NFL player, and the host of Netflix's upcoming "Beastmasters," says he would love to bring back his iconic character, President Camacho from "Idiocracy," to talk about the end of political correctness in America. 
You can watch our full interview with Terry Crews here. 
Follow BI Video: On Twitter More Rich & Famous
